document.full_text: three inmates and their loved ones were charged with attempting to smuggle drugs into a new jersey jail on the pages of a children's coloring book, authorities said on tuesday.
document.title: coloring book used in new jersey jail drug smuggling scheme
lines_and_colors: three inmates and their loved ones were charged with attempting to smuggle drugs into a new jersey jail on the pages of a children's coloring book, authorities said on tuesday.
